pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Noto Emoji (noto-color-emoji) is Emoji 12.0 ready font.
This package is used to build the font from sources.

use.flag: This will replace the textual representation of the black smiling emoji with a pictoral, breaking standards.
Compresses emoji images with zoptlipng. Better compression results at around 5-10% compared to zlib deflate but slower. (default)
